ng

<NEW>

For the moment, as Blackarachnia worked over with the jamming,=
 she went to play over as she kept scanning it, pinging it back and forth, =
and nto getting far.  Finally deciding she was playing with fire, and shutt=
ing her electronic sensors off entirely.


> <OLD>
> 
> TORCA grunted as if=
 he suspected that something more was at play here
> as well, however he co=
ntinued to followed LEO PRIME into the cave
> opening.
> 
> The cave itself=
 was quite large, at least once you passed through the
> mouth of it. It qu=
ickly began to descend its curving path leading
> further and further into =
the darkness that was below. The walls were
> like any other cave, rough an=
d natural, thee was no ambient light in
> here, except for whatever light s=
pilled in from the mouth of the cave
> or what the PREDACONS and MAXIMALS c=
ared to utilize.
> 
> Sensors were getting more and more muffled as they pa=
ssed into it.
> Passive ones still abosorbed, but active ones were basicall=
y of little
> to no use beyond a few feet espeacially ones that used radio =
or energy
> waves that went outside the normal visual or auditory ranges.
>=
 
> Ahead of them they could hear something roar in the distance,
> somethi=
ng loud and reptillian - it was TUSCON! From the sound of it,
> he was perh=
aps several hundred meters ahead of them deeper into the
> cave.
> 
> Howev=
er behind them, as the last of the PREDACONS were making their
> way in, a =
metallic 'door' slid across the mouth of the cave blocking
> out any extern=
al light as well as any chance of egress.
> 
> The trap, at least this sect=
ion of it, had been sprung!
> 
> OOC: Adam the 'door' will wait for all the=
 preds and maxi's, but it is

side when the door closed.

OOC - Since BA was purposefully staying abovegr=
ound, am going to say she didn't get 'cuaght' in it.  She was up in the tre=
es and not going down into the hole.  Will post for her, and then you can e=
ither have her fade into the background so you don't have to pick up anothe=
r thread, or can give her a close out.

<NEW>

At the moment, BLACKARACHNIA=
, stilla boveground and far up in teh trees as the others went over on down=
 and then had the large 'CLANG' go hammer down on top of them, let out a lo=
ud *SIGH*.  

Thinking to herself <They should have known that was going to=
